response.overview: The Highland State Bulldogs, a Division 1 a College with a student population of 3,800 goes undefeated in it's own division and earns the qualification to compete for the national Championship against the Division 1 PAC 10 Powerhouse Southpoint Raiders. Led by Theismann Trophy Winner Quarterback Alonzo Scott looking to secure their 2nd Championship win. Do the Bulldogs of Kentucky have the Will and the Heart to knock off the defending champions Southpoint Raiders? Never in the history of College football has a Division 1 a team gone undefeated, moved up to Division One and defeated a Division 1 Juggernaut. How does it end?
response.title: Thunder Rush
